de.gsi.sd.BBQ_Proto1.data.provider

Class JAPCDataProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gsi.sd.BBQ_Proto1.data.provider.JAPCDataProvider

  • public class JAPCDataProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connects to the FESA device and obtains the acquired data from the Acquisition property. The data can be acquired synchronously or asynchronously via a subscription. In case of a subscription, registered listeners (JAPCDataProviderListener) will be notified when new data is received.

      • isSubscribedData

        public boolean isSubscribedData()
        Check if the data provider is subscribed to a FESA device
        Returns:
        true is the data provider is subscribed

      • subscribe

        public boolean subscribe(java.lang.String deviceName)
        Subscribe to the data of a specified FESA device. The data provider will then be automatically notified if the data of the FESA device changes. The provider will retrieve the new data and notify all registered listeners.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the FESA device name
        Returns:
        true on success

      • unsubscribe

        public boolean unsubscribe()
        Unsubscribe from the data of the FESA device
        Returns:
        true on success

      • getData

        public void getData(java.lang.String deviceName)
        Request synchronous retrieval of data from the FESA device and notify all registered listeners of the new data.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - the FESA device name
